import React, { Component, useState } from "react"; const CheckoutSmallFruits = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", phone: "", address: "", address2: "", state: "", city: "", zip: "", deliveryTime: "", frequency: "", boxType: "" }; const { firstName, lastName, email, phone, address, address2, state, city, zip, deliveryTime, frequency, boxType } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); // this.setState({ // firstName: firstName, // lastName: lastName, // email: email, // phone: phone, // address: address, // address2: address2, // state: state, // city: city, // zip: zip, // deliveryTime: deliveryTime, // frequency: frequency, // boxType: boxType // }) return (

Checkout

Your total

  • Freshbox Small Fruits box
    Includes FREE delivery
    $14.99

Delivery Information

Valid first name is required.
Valid last name is required.
Valid email is required.
Valid phone number is required.
Please enter your shipping address.
Please select a valid state.
Please provide a valid city.
Zip code required.

Payment

Full name as displayed on card
Name on card is required
Credit card number is required
Expiration date required
Security code required
); }; export default CheckoutSmallFruits;
